TopicTitle: Space Shuttle Pack for ksp 1.0.4 dev thread

Articles.Content:

Thanks

I tested the Shuttle several Times in the last few days (Hard-carrer mode with 100% Heat, de-orbit from 70-120 km). Everything is fine, no overheating.

> 
> Thanks
> I tested the Shuttle several Times in the last few days (Hard-carrer mode with 100% Heat, de-orbit from 70-120 km). Everything is fine, no overheating.

Sounds like intensive testing! Wonder whats causing it. I know RO has crazy bugs like that... I will have to look deeper into it.
